answerText: pulsars[10] Hulse and Taylor discovered the first pulsar in this orbital configuration by noting a periodic change in the pulses. Algol is an example of an observationally "eclipsing" form of this setup.

subject: Science
question: Question: The "millisecond" varieties of these stars have been "spun up" through accretion. For 10 points each: [10] Name these rotating stars that emit electromagnetic radiation.
